title: GitHub Mode Collaboration Envelope
description: Schema for cross-entity collaboration message envelopes in GitHub mode.

sourceEntityId.description: ID of the entity sending the collaboration request.

targetEntityId.description: ID of the entity receiving the collaboration request.

intent.description: Intent or command type for this collaboration message.

sourceCommitSha.description: Full commit SHA from the source entity repository.

sourceRunId.description: GitHub Actions run ID that originated this envelope.

trustLevel.description: Trust level of the source context.

policyVersion.description: Version of the collaboration policy governing this envelope.

correlationId.description: Correlation ID for tracing this collaboration exchange.

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when this envelope was created.

ttlSeconds.description: Time-to-live in seconds before this envelope expires.

payload.description: Opaque payload for the collaboration intent.
